title: Episode 85: Aaron Hernandez: Part 2
description:
A troubled boyhood. Teen years fueled by drugs and booze. A promising professional football career in danger of being derailed by addiction. And just when it seemed like Aaron Hernandez's dreams were coming true, he is linked to unimaginable acts of violence.
Support Sinisterhood
